Class UnivariateAffineFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.math.functions.UnivariateAffineFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements ComposableFunction<UnivariateAffineFunction>, InvertibleFunction<UnivariateAffineFunction>, java.io.Serializable

      Instanciates a copy of a given univariate affine function.
